    Overview

    The Microtops II sunphotometer is a 5 channel hand-held instrument for measuring the atmospheric column easily, accurately and dependably.

    The Facilityâ€™s Microtops II sunphotometers have been configured with five filters for the determination of aerosol optical thickness (AOT), including filters at 936nm and 1020nm for the measurement of total water vapor.

    Microtops II features an accuracy comparable to much larger and more expensive instruments

    Specification
